externalId.description: external Id that can be used to reference the conversation and is returned in events

companyId.description: ID of an associated company used for branding, colours etc.

messages.description: List of initial messages for the conversation

participants.description: List of initial participants for the conversation

kind.description: Variable to distinguish between different kinds of participants, defined by company

phoneNumber.description: Optional telephone number for external participants.

joined.description: True if the participant has accepted any terms and/or the invitation to join this conversation.

externalId.description: The original email address of a participant that was converted from type EXTERNAL to USER

attributes.description: A map of custom attributes or properties that are associated with this participant.

presentation.description: Should the conversation be presented as a conversation (message-centric) or a shared space (document-centric)?

roles.description: A map from participant ID to the role of that participant.

additionalProperties.description: The role of a participant in a fileee conversation/space

defaultRole.description: The default role when adding new participants to this conversation.

defaultAdditionalPermissions.description: A set of permissions everyone gets in addition to those from their role.

items.description: A permission in a fileee conversation/space

additionalPermissions.description: A map from participant ID to a set of permissions that this specific participant gets in addition to those from their role.

additionalProperties.description: A permission in a fileee conversation/space

allowedSecondAuthFactors.description: A list of all allowed second authentication factors for this conversation.

invitationIsToS.description: Should the invitation contain Terms of Service to be accepted, should be set to true.

invitationText.description: Custom invitation text to be displayed. May be used for Terms of Service.

forceEmailOnNewParticipant.description: If true, emails will always be send when participants get added to a conversation (without being invited).

expirationText.description: Custom text which will be shown to the user, if a invitation in his/her account has expired.

validUntilTaskFinished.description: Identifier of a task. Conversation will be valid until this task is finished.

validUntil.description: Date until which the conversation is valid.

validForHours.description: Amount of hours an invitation for a conversation should be valid.

notifiers.description: List of notifiers which can trigger an action at a specific point in time for this conversation.

hoursAfterCreation.description: Defines how many hours after a conversation was created, the notifier should be triggered.

moduleId.description: Module ID of the module which will be added to the conversation, once the notifier is triggered.

taskIdentifiers.description: List of task identifiers, which need to be finished to disable the notifier.

temporaryTaskResults.description: Temporary task results, which can be taken to store prefilled or default results of tasks.

creatorNotAdmin.description: If true, the creator of the conversation will not be admin in the conversation. Instead the first added user will have the admin role.

conversationSettings.description: Request to create a new conversation

expirationInformation.expirationText: Sorry this invitation has expired. You can not access it anymore.
